segments.text: So, um, well, I just -- I kind of wanted to, you know, tell you that I'm actually -- I proposed to Kate and we're going to get married.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Wait, what?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah. Yeah, I proposed to her yesterday. We're getting -- we're engaged now and we're going to -- we're going to get married in about eight months.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh, my God.  Congratulations.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah, it's pretty amazing, huh?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I can't -- how did you do it?  What happened?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Well I decided to take her sailing
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: and we were just out on the water and, you know, I just -- I had the ring with me.  And I was like let's do this.  And she was like okay and then we're getting married.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: [LAUGHTER] Well you paint a romantic picture.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Well I didn't want it to be like cheesy, you know.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Did she cry?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: She didn't cry, but she was laughing a lot and it was very exciting, so...
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh, my God.  How long have you been planning on doing this?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Honestly, it was kind of quickly.  It was actually only in the past couple months.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I can't believe this.  You're getting married. It's crazy!
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah. Yeah. So- I know.  I know. I know.  It's weird 'cause it's like the beginning of the rest of my life, you know.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah, it is.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: But uh- no, I mean, you know.  You know, I really want you to like, you know, sort of
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: help Kate out with like planning stuff. I mean, if you want to.  I mean, you guys are good friends anyway so I figured, you know, if you guys want to like -- I mean, you know, I'm sure you enjoy that kind of thing.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah, I would love to. Thanks. [LAUGHTER]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Okay. Well there you go.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh, my God, where -- have you guys talked about where you're going to get married or--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I think we're going to -- we're going to -- we want to do it in Hawaii and just fly everybody in.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh, my God.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I just -- 'cause, I mean, Hawaii just has like the best fruit buffets.  And so I'm just going to say forget, you know, all like kind of meats and all that stuff.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's just going to be like a all fruit--fruit buffet wedding, plus a cake.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Are you going to get married like on the beach barefoot or like fancier?  Like in a church.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Barefoot?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well I don't know.  Throwing it out there.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Um, no, no, no.  It'll be in like a park near the beach.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Okay.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.  But I'm really excited.  So and everybody's going to come out and it'll be a great time.  And--
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Are you going to have a big wedding or like keep it really small like just, you know, family and really close friends?  Or, I mean--
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It'll be kind of small, but not, you know, not tiny, you know.  I want to have, you know, as many people as we can afford to fly out to Hawaii and put up there for--
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's so exciting.  What's the ring look like?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's big and shiny.  I don't know.  It's silver and--
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Big and shiny.  You're such a guy. [LAUGHTER]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah, I don't know. [LAUGHTER] But, yeah, so anyway -- well I wanted to tell you that, you know, 'cause you're one of my good friends and you're Kate's- one of her best friends and-
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I'm so excited for you. That's great. I'm so-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah, yeah. She was actually -- she was going to tell you but I told her that I wanted to tell you and she had to work today anyway, so I decided to-
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well I'm glad you told me.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah, yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: It's fantastic.  I -- congratulations. It's amazing.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Thank you.  I'm really -- I'm really excited.  And it's -- I don't know, it's like a little -- it's like a little scary, 'cause I'm like, ah, you know, it's the first time I've ever done anything like this.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: But, you know, it's like I really love her and I really just -- I can't imagine spending my life with anybody else but her.  So, you know, it's like I know that's the right thing.  And if you have to, you know, if you have to question that, you know, don't- don't do it.  So we're going to do it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: And it's going to -- the -- you know, I told her that I just -- I want the color brown to be as an integral in the wedding.  And, um, maybe some greens and blues.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: And how did she feel about that?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: She's okay with it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well that's good.  It'll be a great wedding.  You're willing to compromise on things.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Exactly, exactly, exactly.  So--
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: She's going to let you have say in the wedding choices?  That's pretty impressive. Very forward-thinking woman. [LAUGHTER]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Well, I mean I just told her--Well I just said, you know, hey, these are my suggestions.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: And brown.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: All fruit and the color brown. Just that. That's all- that's my only request.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: This is why men don't plan weddings. [LAUGHTER]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.  Well maybe--maybe you're right. Maybe there's something to that.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: All fruit and brown. [LAUGHTER]
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: So, um, anyway, do you want to order now?   So, um I mean--
